results.title: Different aortic reflection wave responses following long-term angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibition and beta-blocker in essential hypertension.
results.text_hl: Central pulse pressure was improved following 1 month treatment with an @GENE_AP2B1 @GENE_163 @@@ACE@@@ inhibitor or beta-adrenoceptor blockade following a decrease in arterial wave reflections with @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@ and a higher decrease in regional @<m>DISEASE_Symphalangism_C</m>.<m>_S</m>.<m>_Lewis_Type</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566100 @@@aortic stiffness@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.
